ovdesc.p: CCY.HISTORY is a new 'L'ive type file containing the effective dates of currency rate changes for any currency for any year. The file also holds the currency file current number at the effective date.

To achieve the implementation of this file at existing sites the BLD.CURRENCY.HIS routine is used to build complete records in the CURRENCY$HIS file, and the BLD.CCY.HISTORY routine is used to build CCY.HISTORY records from the CURRENCY$HIS file.
The CCY.HISTORY file is maintained by the EOD.CCY.HISTORY routine in CCY.CYCLE.DATA at end of day. Complete CURRENCY file recors will be maintained by the AUTH.RECORD.WRITE routine.
In addition there is a GET.CCY.HISTORY routine that will obtain the required currency record from a date and currency code.
Summary: Unique identifier of currency and year.
Format: Three character alpha currency code and four character numeric year (3A.4N)

desc.p: Currency file current numbers associated with the effective date of rate change.
A maximum of 8 characters may be entered.
Eight character numeric date on which the rate for the currency has changed. The date is only present if the currency rate has changed. Multi-valued field held in descending order.
